meanings.definition: The act of climbing without the use of artificial aids.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed campusing up the hill during our nature hike.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's campusing up the tree was quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: Her determination in campusing the steep slope was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The campusing competition showcased incredible athleticism.

meanings.definition: The act of climbing a rock face using only one's hands and feet.
meanings.sent1: Rock climbers practice campusing to improve their skills.
meanings.sent2: We watched a documentary on the dangers of campusing without proper gear.
meanings.sent3: The campusing race at the gym was intense and fun.

meanings.sent5: The campusing expedition to the mountain peak was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The act of climbing a rock face using only one's hands and feet, typically for exercise or recreation.
meanings.sent1: Campusing is a great way to stay active and enjoy nature.
meanings.sent2: We planned a campusing trip to the national park next weekend.
